Bridgehead is a local coffee shop chain with Fair Trade at the center of its mission. This location is a café as well as where all of Bridgehead's coffee is roasted. This site is also licensed and serves local craft beer after 4pm. Ahora, which means Now, reflects our commitment to offer a variety of Mexican dishes adapted to today’s taste. We all know our parents always told us "Eat your veggies", so we pack as much nutrition in the way of veggies, fruits, grains, nuts, pulses and more, as we can to fill your bellies & hearts & fuel your body to live a healthy, active lifestyle!

Compassion towards animals.

We believe that you can create great tasting meals and drinks without the need for animal products or by-products

From our healthier options like our powerhouse smoothies,protein-packed sandwiches, nutritious breakfast sandwiches to our sweet treats, there is sure to be something for everyone to enjoy!

Being Kind to Our Planet 

Choosing plant-based ingdredients allows us to leave a much smaller impact on the environment regarding things like green-house gas emissions and deforestation.

We also try our best to buy from local farmers & producers. This not only supports other small businesses; but also reduces emissions with less travelling of goods from far distances. We hope to heal our planet and set a great example for more generations to come!

Since 1980, we have been baking for special diets (diabetic, celiac, yeast, salt, sugar and lactose-free) using only the finest ingredients. We are dedicated to good, healthy, baked-from-scratch products. We welcome special orders, and are always up to the challenge of creating something delicious and custom-tailored to your dietary needs. 

Some of our delicious restricted-diet products include: 

Gluten-free breads: Rice, millet, quinoa, gluten-free "Pure Oat," and bean flours are used to create wholesome, tasty, and high-fibre, high-protein breads. 

Wheat-free breads: Wholegrain spelt flour, plain or with flax, poppy, sesame, and/or sunflower seeds. Even a raisin-cinnamon bread! 

Gluten-free and wheat-free muffins and muffin loaves: Rice and spelt flours are used to make these fruit muffins which are also vegan and sugar free - bonus! Daily flavours are up to the discretion of Jean, our wonderful baker, but often include varieties like peach-strawberry, carrot-pineapple-almond, blueberry, and apple-cinnamon. 

Gluten-free scones: Made with millet and gluten-free oat flours, these sweet scones are the real thing. Flavours include blueberry, raspberry, cranberry and apple cinnamon. 

Cakes: Gluten-, wheat-, dairy-, egg-, sugar-free varieties. Custom made and decorated for your special occasion. We also do wedding cakes! 

+ a wide variety of gluten-, wheat-, dairy-, egg-, yeast-, and sugar-free products! 

Customers often come into the bakery asking what's just "regular." We point them to our famous, baked-from-scratch goodies that have kept customers coming back for 34 years. These include: 

Chelsea buns: Old fashioned, whole-wheat, butterscotch and cinnamon rolls, complete with raisins and California walnuts.

Who doesn't need a bit of spice in their life?  Baccanalle is all about giving you delicious, unforgettable, flavourful food.  We specialize in Caribbean and Soul inspired food with healthy choice options.  We also offer a range of dishes to bring you a rounded menu featuring our take on Canadian and international dishes and flavours.  Stock up and order online for our prepared meals and baked goods, check us out for catering.  (see www.baccanalle.com for dates).

We are currently building up our hours starting with 8-3 in line with the office cafe hours. Our spot will be called Capital Fare Cafe (sign has not changed yet from the former Li's Cafe). We'll be featuring a fresh, healthy lifestyle menu with local produce as much as we can. We are excited to already be building in produce from our farmer friends at Ottawa Farmers' Market and Beechwood Market. I'm excited to be putting more of my Chef skills to work - beyond Caribbean.
We will be featuring Caribbean on Fridays at our lunch counter and will regularly have some of our Caribbean staples available every day - 
- Jerk Chicken
- House Vegan Patties
- House Beef Patties 
- Black Bean & Corn Salads
- Baccanalle Specialty Foods
- Our signature Sorrel (coming soon)

Today we are also featuring (in addition to our regular menu) the following items take out (before 4pm)
-Fresh Tomato Soup (vegan, gluten-Free)
-Vegan Curry Meal (vegan, gluten-Free)
-Jerk Chicken Meal (gluten-Free)
-Ham & Pea Soup (gluten-Free)
-Fresh Crepes with wonderful toppings!
Starting in September we will open on Fridays later for takeout - and other days for larger order pickups. We will also have prepared meals available in the fall. As usual you will find great vegan, gluten-free, IBD sensitive and lower fat options-and many other lifestyle choices.
